trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Clearlake
There were no other sightings in Clearlake on or around November 15th 2007
divs: sighting detailsi was parked stargazing at hwy 29\hwy 20 when a starlike light twinkeling above caught my eye. as i kept observing i called to my then girlfriend to come and see.she got scared and asked for us to leave.i did so and told friends and family what i had seen and they thought i was kidding.i was'nt.whateverit was actually intreacted with me in a game of peek a boo.a couple of weeks later i was at the 21st address and it was back behind my van.iwas parked uphill backwards and noticed it in my mirror. i told my friend whom i had told of the first sighting,to get out and check this out.we did and she was in aawww.well it started its game again and then while play with me this danceing peek a boo game again stopped behind a fair sized branch momentarily then turnned from adanceing star of starlike color to a hot air balloon size red circle and stood stationary for about 1\2 a minute then in a flash of three level spurts was gone to an easterly direction. i'm not very good on this computer typing. but what i say is true and i am a firm believer of these other beings and crafts which we on earth encounter.i'm a 53 year old man and i'm not her to jerk anybodys chain. at least consider what i am saying to be real as i have no reason to lie.their out ther and very real and i am a very interested person when it comes to these things i just dont understand why deny it and not be more forthcoming about it all. at least somebody call me. thank you cesario a jacob usmc honorabley discharged
